overview:
Ainstainer Group establishes and supports clientsâ€™ own Scrum teams in Ukraine. All Scrum teams we build are cross-functional and Agile spirit.

  1. We start our work from discussing and helping you to define the size of your team, optimum competences and experience for each member.
  2. The next stage of our work is searching, interviewing and testing the appropriate candidates.
  3. And, if the candidate meets all requirements, we will send you his/her CV and, after your approval of it, your online interview with the candidate will be arranged.
  4. The number of CVâ€™s you may receive and online interviews are unlimited and free of charge.
  5. When the team members are defined, we provide them with office space, required hardware and software.
  6. We also help our clients to reach and sustain teamâ€™s maximum velocity and have quick return on their investments.

Why choose us?

  1. We protect you from overpayment (provide you with information about average salaries in Ukrainian IT market);
  2. With our services you may do almost any projects.
  3. We search for all appropriate candidates and do not suggest to our clients employees from our personnel.
  4. Our recruiters are familiar with software development techniques, so they know whom to search for.
